title: A Cd-based MOF: iodine capture and enhanced efficiency of perovskite solar cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27697-27702
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05219F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yaxin Hou, Yang Liu, Juan Chai
In this work, a Cd-based metal–organic framework (MOF) {Cd(H2L)2}n (Cd-MOF) (L = 5-(3-carboxypyridin-4-yl)isophthalic acid) has been synthesized solvothermally and characterized.
